rows.label: xs12010150_MSG0001
rows.name:
All right, BLADEs:
you heard what the man said—it's now or never.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12010150_MSG0002
rows.name: So let's get right to it:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12010150_MSG0003
rows.name:
your mission is to secure the Lifehold Core,
and activate its backup power system.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12010150_MSG0004
rows.name:
We'll have the exact location isolated in the next two hours—
you'll leave as soon as we have coordinates.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12010150_MSG0005
rows.name:
We're counting on all of you—
each and every single BLADE will participate in this mission.[ST:wait ]
